titleStmt.title: A declaration or remonstrance, to His Majesties loyal and faithful subjects; touching brokers, usurers, scrivenors, and solicitors: for, and in behalf of all merchants, citizens, countrey-men, and other His Majesties good subjects, within the kingdoms of England, Scotland, Ireland, and Dominion of Wales.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
